text: The Big Comfy Couch is a Canadian children's television series. ==Other names== The programs is known as Le Monde de Loonette [English: The World of Loonette or Loonette's World] when broadcast in Quebec and France, and El sofa da la imaginaci√≥n [English: The Couch of Imagination] when broadcast in Latin America and Spain. ==Schedule and production== It aired from March 2, 1992, until December 29, 2006. It was produced by Cheryl Wagner and Robert Mills, directed by Wayne Moss, Robert Mills and Steve Wright. It premiered on March 2, 1992, in Canada and on January 9, 1995, in the United States on PBS stations across the country. The program was also broadcast on Treehouse TV from 1997 to 2011. == Characters == * Loonette (portrayed by Alyson Court from 1992 to 2002) is the freckled-faced female lead of the series. * Molly (performed by Bob Stutt) Category:1993 Canadian television series debuts Category:2005 Canadian television series endings Category:Canadian children's television series
title: The Big Comfy Couch
